title: Connection issues
body:
Hey im unable to connect to PVP.net server. 

It says "Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found '_**here**_'. But when i click on this link, it doesn't take me anywhere. 

The OCE server status is functional, and I have been through all of the support solutions but nothing has helped. 

Any idea what might be going wrong?

replies.body:
Hey there,

When you say clicking the link brings you nowhere, do you mean you're unable to connect to the page?

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps.

So what happens is when i click on the "here" button. Nothing happens, nothing loads. It doesnt link me anywhere. 

Also, i have set my DNS to the 8.8.8.8, and 8.8.4.4.
still no change

Have you attempted a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?

Have you tried [adding the necessary exceptions to your firewall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3).
